LanguageData.OvipositorM.label: aedeagus
LanguageData.OvipositorM.description: The male reproductive organ of an arthropod, very loosely comparable to a penis. Its a very complex structure that varies for each species and may have hooks, claspers, setae along or around the phalus.
LanguageData.OvipositorF.label: ovipositor
LanguageData.OvipositorF.description: A penis-like segmented structure capable of laying eggs inside a host.
LanguageData.InsectAnus.label: insect anus
LanguageData.InsectAnus.description: An anus thats hard and chitinous on the outside, but soft and slimey on the inside.
